nomadSeries.title: The Nomad Series
nomadSeries.taglineSubtitle: The Nomad Roof Top Tent in Gray.

descriptionShort.title: Where Off-Road Meets Comfort
descriptionShort.content: The Nomad Roof Top Tent is your all-access pass to the wilderness, designed with 4WD enthusiasts and avid campers in mind. Whether you're tackling rugged trails or seeking a peaceful escape in nature, this tent delivers unbeatable comfort and convenience.

descriptionLong.title: The Nomad Series
descriptionLong.content: The Nomad Roof Top Tent is your ticket to the ultimate 4WD and camping adventure. Whether you're tackling challenging trails or embracing the tranquillity of nature, this tent brings comfort and reliability to your journey. Join the ranks of intrepid adventurers who have discovered the freedom of rooftop camping. Elevate your 4WD experience to new heights with the Nomad Roof Top Tent and conquer the off-road with confidence and style!

list.title: Spacious Freedom
list.description: With an opening size of 211cm x 131cm x 148cm, you'll have room to unwind after a day of thrilling 4WD action.

list.title: Compact Convenience
list.description: When it's time to hit the trail again, the tent folds down to a mere 211cm x 131cm x 18cm, ensuring a low-profile for your vehicle.

list.title: Recharge Your Spirit
list.description: Enjoy a cosy night's sleep on the 205cm x 122cm x 5cm bed. For added luxury, opt for the 7cm thick mattress.

list.title: Trail-Tough
list.description: With a gross weight of 78KG and a net weight of 61KG, this tent is built to withstand the challenges of off-road adventures.

list.title: Built to Conquer
list.description: Crafted from aluminium alloy honeycomb plate shell material, this tent can handle the most demanding terrains.

list.title: Weather Warrior
list.description: The main canvas fabric, a 280G Polyester Cotton Lattice with a PU coating, boasts a waterproof index of 3000+. Rain, snow, or sunshineâ€”your shelter is secure.

includedAccessories.title: Accessories to Fuel Your Adventure
includedAccessories.subtitle: Enjoy your experience to the fullest with these included accessories.

list.title: Roof Rack
list.description: Carry all your gear without compromising space.

list.title: LED Lighting Strip
list.description: Illuminate your campsite for late-night gatherings.

list.title: USB & Cigarette Outlet
list.description: Keep devices charged to capture every moment.

list.title: Anderson Plug
list.description: Ensure you have a reliable power source for extended journeys.

optionalAccessories.title: Take Your Adventure Further
optionalAccessories.subtitle: Enhance your experience with these optional accessories.

list.title: 10,000mAh Powerbank
list.description: Keep your devices powered wherever the trail leads.

list.title: 270 Awning
list.description: Expand your outdoor living space, complete with lights and supports.

specList.description: 205 cm x 122 cm x 5 cm (Option Available For 7cm Thick Mattress)
280G Polyester Cotton Lattice PU Coating, Waterproof Index 3000+
